useCase.name: Perform Operation (e.g., compaction)
useCase.description: Scenario where an operation is performed

preconditions.precondition: Developer interacts with CLI or REST/UI applications

useCase.trigger: Interaction between Developer and various systems

mainSequence.step: Developer performs operation through CLI or UI
CLI tool actions the request and communicates with Dataset Management System
Dataset Management System executes the operation on Dataset Instance
Dataset confirms successful operation completion to CLI or REST API
CLI or REST API signals success to Developer
